title1: Bringing back the lost essence of Darjeeling Hills
caption1: Mukh Bandh Kaam Suru (MBKS) Trust is Non Profit Organisation working since 2017 in the Darjeeling Hills. MBKS Trust was founded by a group of passionate youths aiming to bring back the lost essence of the Hills through concerted effort on the upliftment of the most vulnerable groups in all sectors.
caption2: Sustainable and holistic development of Hill communities with pathways to opportunities.
caption3: Empowerment of target groups with comprehensive focus on education, healthcare and livelihood.
caption4: Our core program focus are education, healthcare, poverty alleviation, sanitation & hygine, livelihood missions and environnment & sustainability.
